@template public
{{div: class=white container}}


h1. Describe your project and get a free start!

Describe your project and we are returning a competitive offer by giving you a month for free!
 
{{contact_form: receiver_email:support@mothership1.com | custom | subject: Pricing Information}}
    
    {{html: <label class="control-label" for="sender_email">Email Address</label>}}
    {{div: class=control-group}}
        {{div4: class=col-md-4}}
            {{ email: id=sender_email | name=sender_email | required | placeholder= Your email address | class=form-control}}
        {{div4}}
    {{div}}
    
    {{html: <label class="control-label" for="sender_name">Contact Name</label>}}
    {{div: class=control-group}}
    {{div4: class=col-md-4}}
        {{ text: id=sender_name | name=sender_name | required=true | placeholder= Your name | class=form-control}}
    {{div4}}
    {{div}}

    {{html: <label class="control-label" for="phonenumber">Phone Number</label>}}
    {{div: class=control-group}}
    {{div4: class=col-md-4}}
        {{ text: id=phonenumber | name=phonenumber |  placeholder= Phone number | class=form-control}}
    {{div4}}
    {{div}}

    {{html: <div class="clearfix"><label class="control-label">Service type</label></div>}}
    {{div4: class=col-md-4 margin-top-small}}
        {{dropdown: name=Select service type | id=selected_type | class=margin-left-large | multiple
            * Machine
            * Storage
            * Desktop
        }}
    {{div4}}

    {{div: class=control-group }}
    {{div4:class=col-md-12}}
        {{html: <label class="control-label" for="description">Short description of your project!</label>}}
    {{div4}}
    {{div4: class=col-md-4 margin-top-small}}
        {{ textarea: rows=10 | cols=100 | required | id=description | name=body | class=form-control}}
    {{div4}}
    {{div}}

    {{div: class=control-group}}
        {{submit: class=btn btn-primary btn-small | data-loading-text=Sending... }}
           {{html:KickStart!}} 
        {{submit}}
        {{ reset }}
    {{div}}
{{ contact_form }}

@divend
